content: Ok .. how 'bout this - CarePlan use in some workflows would need to capture whether or not a patient has received (or refused) an advanced directive. Anybody? ;)
it seems that this would be closely related to consent for care
both clinical consent and AHD's are essentially the patient (or decision maker) making an assertion about their desired treatment
(typically with assertions by both a provider and decision maker that certain information has been given and understood)
